name: Get Back In The Space Station!
name_original: Get Back In The Space Station!
description:
Credits to https://instagram.com/gyaztout?utm_medium=copy_link for the voiceover

Controlls :

  •  Boost => Trigger
  • Break => mainButton(A, X)
  •  Grab => Gripbutton

Hint (Read if stuck):

Don't lose items! you'll have to restart the game (Sorry)

  1. Remove sparking resistor from satellite (Grab it)
  2. Grab new resistor from forcefield and place it in satellite (drop near the desired position)
  3. Go back to the entrance and press the button
  4. Forcefield is locked
  5. grab cable from dead astronaut
  6. place it in the gap
  7. Buttons determine which item the camera is focussing on
  8. if the focussed item is far away enough force field opens
  9. grab drill from the forcefield
  10. drill of the screw at the little forcefield
  11. hit button
  12. go in
